title: 5 Bollywood Actresses Who Are Set To Wear Producers' Hat In 2017
text:
facebook 793 SHARES 
There was a point of time when actresses were known to just look pretty and add glamour to a film. Times have changed now, and actresses are climbing the ladder of success by trying their hands on different businesses. In 2017, several mainstream actresses are making the shift behind the camera, and will don the hat of a producer. Here are the actresses, who will be producing films set to release in 2017. Richa Chadha - Khoon Aali Chithi 
Richa Chadha is all set to make her debut as a producer with a Punjabi short film. The movie will soon be released digitally. The short film is about love and peace, set during the Khalistan movement in the 80's. It will also talk about how this movement affected the common man in Punjab. The short film was selected for International Film Festival of South Asia, Toronto. Priyanka Chopra - Sarvann 
Tell us one thing this talented woman can't do? Priyanka, who will soon be seen in the film Baywatch , is also a producer. She owns a production company, called Purple Pebble Pictures. In the past, PeeCee has produced a Marathi film, Ventilator , and in 2017 her second project Sarvann (a Punjabi film) will be releasing. Anushka Sharma - Phillauri 
Anushka Sharma nailed it has a producer with her film, NH10 . The movie got recognition from critics and audience alike. Phillauri will be Anushka's second film as a producer. The trailer is out and is already making the right noises. If you have missed it, see it here. Sonam Kapoor - Battle for Bittora 
We all know Sonam Kapoor's sister, Rhea Kapoor, is a producer. Her first film was Aisha , and she is already working on her second film, Veere Di Wedding , which stars sister Sonam, Kareena Kapoor, and Swara Bhaskar. However, Sonam wants to try her hand at producing films now. The Neerja star was recently in the news that said she will to co-produce the upcoming comedy flick Battle of Bittora . Twinkle Khanna - Padman 
The lady, who is known for her wit and sarcasm, has started her own production house named Mrs Funnybones Movies. In the past, Twinkle has produced a couple of movies under the production banner, Hari Om Productions , which was launched by husband Akshay Kumar. However, the new production house will be handled exclusively by Twinkle. Her first film, Padman , is said to be directed by R. Bakki, and stars hubby Akshay, and actress Sonam Kapoor and Radhika Apte. Photo Credit: BCCL
